Attribute.Name: title
Attribute.Value: The State of Nanosystems and Nanotechnology Worldwide

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Value: This web-based software teaches the user concepts about nanotechnology and nanocomputers. A nanometer is a billion of a meter and spans approximately 10 atomic diamters. Nanotechnology is the technology for designing and applying "nanosystems." The software is broken down in the following sections: - Tutorial Introduction - Guide to Selected Introductory Information from the Web - Tutorial Introduction - What are Nanotechnology & Nanocomputers? - Proposed Technologies for Future Nanocomputers The software features information on the following topics: - Overview of Nanoelectronics - Overview of Quantum Dots - Overview of Molecular-Scale Electronics - Feature Article on Nanoelectronics from High Technology Careers Magazine - Overview of Nanoelectronics on Texas Instruments Corp
